It's not whether one hunts for food, but if when one hunts, he does it for sport or survival. That is the difference.
President Obama is a Natural

Well is obvious none of you read the whole story. He had a guide, he did not know the area, he paid for license to hunt a lion. He went thru all the steps he was legally obligated to do. The GUIDE knew what he was doing was wrong, THE GUIDE set the bait. Mr. Palmer took the shot with BOW. He had no idea what lion that was, the GUIDE DID. Mr Palmer didn't have to come forward and say I think I killed that lion. He did so because he did everything he was supposed to be able to take that shot. Wether or not you think hunting is right is irrelevant, he did so legally. So stop the witch hunt on the man, and focus on the guide who knew the land, knew what he was doing.
And he's laughing

Heather, pastors ALREADY have the right to refuse to preform marriages for ANYONE. Got that? Same with churches; You can not force a church to hold a religious ceremony if they choose not to AND further they can do so without consequence. So your point is....what? And for God's sake, read the FACTS of the friggin' Klein case and the others before you go making yourself look like an even bigger idiot than you've managed to do thus far. Now, unless your reading comprehension skills are non-existent, answer the question; What """"extra"""" rights do LGBT people have over heterosexuals? If you chose not to answer and sidestep it again, you're original premise is null and void because you've had numerous opportunities to explain, but have refused to do so since I called you on it yesterday. Oh, and newsflash, sweetcheeks, According to people like you, if the SCOTUS legalized gay marriage, we were all going to face God's wrath post haste. So either God's taking his sweet time with the wrath distribution or he doesn't give a flying rat's ass about homosexuality like you think he does.
